title: Beautiful 4 Bedroom House for Sale in Nugegoda
details:
REF NO: HFS0088

Beautiful 4 Bedroom House for Sale in Nugegoda

- Fully furnished
- Colonial style
- Fully tiled
- 4 Bedrooms
- 3 Bathrooms
- 2000 sqft
- Living and Dinning
- TV room with air conditioned
- In built wardrobes for each room
- Wet and dry kitchen
- Spacious garden
- Private garden along with the guest room
- Servant quarters
- Solar powered (zero electricity bill)
- Sump
- Overhead water tank with motor pump and pressure pump
- 02 car park spaces
- Quiet neighborhood
-Designed by the famous Architect Geoffrey Bawa

Location:

- 5 min walking distance to Highlevel road
- Easy access to restaurants, supermarkets, banks, International schools, public transport etc.

Price of the property - LKR 58 million
Price is exclusive of legal fee and stamp duty fee

Inspections with prior appointments
